SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.sex, a.phone, a.email, a.birthday, a.address, a.remark, (SELECT c.depart_name FROM hotel_department c WHERE c.parent_id = '0') AS "collegeName",
(SELECT e.depart_name FROM (hotel_department e,hotel_user b) LEFT JOIN hotel_department d ON d.parent_id = e.depart_id LEFT JOIN hotel_department c ON c.parent_id = d.depart_id WHERE b.depart_id=c.depart_id AND b.user_id =#{userId} ) AS "departName",
(SELECT d.depart_name FROM (hotel_department d,hotel_user b) LEFT JOIN hotel_department c ON d.depart_id = c.parent_id WHERE b.depart_id=c.depart_id AND b.user_id =#{userId} )AS "professionName",
(SELECT c.depart_name FROM (hotel_department c,hotel_user b) WHERE b.depart_id=c.depart_id AND b.user_id =#{userId} ) AS "gradeName" FROM hotel_userdetail a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.sex, b.user_type AS "userType", a.phone, a.email, a.birthday, a.address, c.depart_name AS "gradeName", d.depart_name AS "professionName", e.depart_name AS "departName", a.remark FROM hotel_userdetail a, hotel_user b, hotel_department c LEFT JOIN hotel_department d ON d.depart_id=c.parent_id LEFT JOIN hotel_department e ON e.depart_id=d.parent_id WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.depart_id=c.depart_id
AND e.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{departName},'%')
AND c.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{gradeName}, '%')
AND d.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{professionName}, '%')
AND a.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND b.user_type = #{userType}

SELECT a.user_id, a.user_name, a.phone, a.email, a.birthday, a.address, a.sex, c.depart_name AS "gradeName", d.depart_name AS "professionName", e.depart_name AS "departName", a.remark FROM hotel_userdetail a, hotel_user b, hotel_department c LEFT JOIN hotel_department d ON d.depart_id=c.parent_id LEFT JOIN hotel_department e ON e.depart_id=d.parent_id WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.depart_id=c.depart_id AND b.user_type = '1'
AND c.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{gradeName}, '%')
AND d.depart_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{professionName}, '%')
AND a.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
SELECT a.user_name AS "userName", b.login_name AS "phone" FROM hotel_userdetail a, hotel_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id
